sentence.Network_en: Suburbia is a sadder place than of yore.

sentence.Network_cn: 这比受骗更令汤姆难受.

sentence.Network_en: The divorce left him a sadder but a wiser man.
sentence.Network_cn: 他离婚是吃一堑长一智.
